thread.title: Pankaj Advani calls on PM Modi
thread.title_full: Pankaj Advani calls on PM Modi - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Pankaj Advani calls on PM Modi
text:
NEW DELHI: Ace cueist Pankaj Advani on Thursday met Prime Minister Narendra Modi days after pocketing his 14th world title with the triumph in IBSF World Billiards Championship.
"An honour to meet our Prime Minister @narendramodi Sir! Thank you for your time and best wishes #proudmoment," Advani tweeted to his 87,000 followers soon after meeting Modi.
India's most successful cueist had added another feather to his cap by winning the World Billiards crown, beating Singapore's Peter Gilchrist in Adelaide on Sunday.
